<ul><li>August 1
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Annabelle_Gamson" title="Annabelle Gamson">Annabelle Gamson</a>, 94, dancer and choreographer (b. 1928)<sup id="cite_ref-1247" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1247"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1247<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Howard_Kunreuther" title="Howard Kunreuther">Howard Kunreuther</a>, 84, economist (b. 1938)<sup id="cite_ref-1248" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1248"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1248<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Le_Batard" title="David Le Batard">David Le Batard</a>, 50, graphic artist (b. 1972)<sup id="cite_ref-1249" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1249"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1249<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dom_Minasi" title="Dom Minasi">Dom Minasi</a>, 80, jazz guitarist, composer and music producer (b. 1943)<sup id="cite_ref-1250" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1250"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1250<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Williamson_Murray" title="Williamson Murray">Williamson Murray</a>, 81, historian (b. 1941)<sup id="cite_ref-1251" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1251"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1251<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wes_Nisker" title="Wes Nisker">Wes Nisker</a>, 8081, author and Buddhism instructor (b. 1942)<sup id="cite_ref-1252" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1252"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1252<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sheila_Oliver" title="Sheila Oliver">Sheila Oliver</a>, 71, politician, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lieutenant_Governor_of_New_Jersey" title="Lieutenant Governor of New Jersey">lieutenant governor of New Jersey</a> (since 2018), member (20042018) and speaker (20102014) of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Jersey_General_Assembly" title="New Jersey General Assembly">New Jersey General Assembly</a> (b. 1952)<sup id="cite_ref-1253" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1253"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1253<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R._Stewart_Wood" title="R. Stewart Wood">R. Stewart Wood</a>, 89, Episcopal bishop (b. 1934)<sup id="cite_ref-1254" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1254"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1254<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>August 2
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arkansas_Razorbacks_men%27s_basketball" title="Arkansas Razorbacks men's basketball">Charles Balentine</a>, 60, basketball player (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arkansas_Razorbacks_men%27s_basketball" title="Arkansas Razorbacks men's basketball">Arkansas Razorbacks</a>) (b. 1962/1963)<sup id="cite_ref-1255" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1255"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1255<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Brodeur" title="Paul Brodeur">Paul Brodeur</a>, 92, journalist and writer (b. 1931)<sup id="cite_ref-1256" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1256"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1256<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sherry_Combs_Johnson" title="Sherry Combs Johnson">Sherry Combs Johnson</a>, 84, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ProRodeo_Hall_of_Fame" title="ProRodeo Hall of Fame">Hall of Fame</a> rodeo barrel racer (b. 1938)<sup id="cite_ref-1257" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1257"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1257<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constance_Darnowski" title="Constance Darnowski">Constance Darnowski</a>, 88, Olympic hurdler (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Athletics_at_the_1952_Summer_Olympics" title="Athletics at the 1952 Summer Olympics">1952</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Athletics_at_the_1956_Summer_Olympics_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_80_metres_hurdles" title="Athletics at the 1956 Summer Olympics  Women's 80 metres hurdles">1956</a>) (b. 1934)<sup id="cite_ref-1258" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1258"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1258<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Delano_Lewis" title="Delano Lewis">Delano Lewis</a>, 84, diplomat, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ambassadors_of_the_United_States_to_South_Africa" title="List of ambassadors of the United States to South Africa">ambassador to South Africa</a> (19992001) (b. 1938)<sup id="cite_ref-1259" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1259"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1259<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_E._Noennig" title="Mark E. Noennig">Mark E. Noennig</a>, 75, politician (b. 1947)<sup id="cite_ref-1260" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1260"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1260<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vincent_Speranza" title="Vincent Speranza">Vincent Speranza</a>, 98, World War II veteran (b. 1925)<sup id="cite_ref-1261" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1261"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1261<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>August 3
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Barnes_(murderer)" title="James Barnes (murderer)">James Barnes</a>, 61, convicted murderer (b. 1962)<sup id="cite_ref-1262" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1262"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1262<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Cafiero" title="James Cafiero">James Cafiero</a>, 94, politician, member of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Jersey_General_Assembly" title="New Jersey General Assembly">New Jersey General Assembly</a> (19681972) and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Jersey_Senate" title="New Jersey Senate">Senate</a> (19721982, 19902004) (b. 1928)<sup id="cite_ref-1263" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1263"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1263<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walter_Charles" title="Walter Charles">Walter Charles</a>, 78, actor (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sweeney_Todd:_The_Demon_Barber_of_Fleet_Street" title="Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street">Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fletch_Lives" title="Fletch Lives">Fletch Lives</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prancer_(film)" title="Prancer (film)">Prancer</a></i>) (b. 1945)<sup id="cite_ref-1264" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1264"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1264<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Davis" title="Carl Davis">Carl Davis</a>, 86, American-born British conductor and composer (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_French_Lieutenant%27s_Woman_(film)" title="The French Lieutenant's Woman (film)">The French Lieutenant's Woman</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pride_and_Prejudice_(1995_TV_series)" title="Pride and Prejudice (1995 TV series)">Pride and Prejudice</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/King_David_(film)" title="King David (film)">King David</a></i>) (b. 1936)<sup id="cite_ref-1265" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1265"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1265<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_M._Goody" title="Richard M. Goody">Richard M. Goody</a>, 102, British-born atmospheric physicist (b. 1921)<sup id="cite_ref-1266" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1266"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1266<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Hardy_(eater)" title="Charles Hardy (eater)">Charles Hardy</a>, 57, competitive eater (b. 1966)<sup id="cite_ref-1267" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1267"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1267<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Margolis" title="Mark Margolis">Mark Margolis</a>, 83, actor (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breaking_Bad" title="Breaking Bad">Breaking Bad</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oz_(TV_series)" title="Oz (TV series)">Oz</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scarface_(1983_film)" title="Scarface (1983 film)">Scarface</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Better_Call_Saul" title="Better Call Saul">Better Call Saul</a></i>) (b. 1939)<sup id="cite_ref-1268" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1268"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1268<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Melvin_George_Talbert" title="Melvin George Talbert">Melvin George Talbert</a>, 89, Methodist bishop (b. 1934)<sup id="cite_ref-1269" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1269"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1269<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nechama_Tec" title="Nechama Tec">Nechama Tec</a>, 92, Polish-born sociologist and writer (b. 1931)<sup id="cite_ref-1270" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1270"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1270<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adrienne_Vaughan" title="Adrienne Vaughan">Adrienne Vaughan</a>, 45, publishing house executive, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bloomsbury_USA" class="mw-redirect" title="Bloomsbury USA">president of Bloomsbury USA</a> (b. 1977/1978)<sup id="cite_ref-1271" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1271"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1271<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>August 4
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jango_Edwards" title="Jango Edwards">Jango Edwards</a>, 73, clown and comedian (b. 1950)<sup id="cite_ref-1272" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1272"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1272<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>

Windhorst</a>, 88, jurist, lawyer and politician, member of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louisiana_State_Senate" title="Louisiana State Senate">Louisiana State Senate</a> (19721992) (b. 1935)<sup id="cite_ref-1421" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1421"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1421<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>August 28

<li>August 30
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norman_Rodgers" title="Norman Rodgers">Norman Rodgers</a>, 95, politician, member of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iowa_State_Senate" class="mw-redirect" title="Iowa State Senate">Iowa State Senate</a> (19731987) (b. 1927)<sup id="cite_ref-1440" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1440"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1440<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>

<ul><li>September 1
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dennis_Austin" title="Dennis Austin">Dennis Austin</a>, 76, computer programmer, co-creator of <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microsoft_PowerPoint" title="Microsoft PowerPoint">Microsoft PowerPoint</a> (b. 1947)<sup id="cite_ref-1451" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1451"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1451<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stains_(Los_Angeles_band)" title="Stains (Los Angeles band)">Robert Becerra</a>, 64, guitarist (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stains_(Los_Angeles_band)" title="Stains (Los Angeles band)">Stains</a>) (b. 1958/1959)<sup id="cite_ref-1452" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1452"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1452<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jimmy_Buffett" title="Jimmy Buffett">Jimmy Buffett</a>, 76, singer-songwriter ("<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaritaville" title="Margaritaville">Margaritaville</a>", "<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Come_Monday" title="Come Monday">Come Monday</a>", "<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cheeseburger_in_Paradise_(song)" title="Cheeseburger in Paradise (song)">Cheeseburger in Paradise</a>") and businessman, founder of <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jimmy_Buffett%27s_Margaritaville" title="Jimmy Buffett's Margaritaville">Jimmy Buffett's Margaritaville</a> (b. 1946)<sup id="cite_ref-1453" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1453"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1453<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gerald_P._Carmen" title="Gerald P. Carmen">Gerald P. Carmen</a>, 93, diplomat, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representative_of_the_United_States_to_the_European_Office_of_the_United_Nations" class="mw-redirect" title="Representative of the United States to the European Office of the United Nations">representative to the European Office of the UN</a> (19841986) and administrator of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/General_Services_Administration" title="General Services Administration">GSA</a> (19811984) (b. 1930)<sup id="cite_ref-1454" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1454"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1454<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elton_Gissendanner" title="Elton Gissendanner">Elton Gissendanner</a>, 95, veterinarian and politician, member of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Florida_House_of_Representatives" title="Florida House of Representatives">Florida House of Representatives</a> (19671968) (b. 1927)<sup id="cite_ref-1455" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1455"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1455<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Malley" title="Bill Malley">Bill Malley</a>, 88, production designer (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Exorcist" title="The Exorcist">The Exorcist</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Fury_(film)" title="The Fury (film)">The Fury</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Ninth_Configuration" title="The Ninth Configuration">The Ninth Configuration</a></i>) (b. 1934)<sup id="cite_ref-1456" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1456"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1456<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Richardson" title="Bill Richardson">Bill Richardson</a>, 75, politician, diplomat, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ambassadors_of_the_United_States_to_the_United_Nations" title="List of ambassadors of the United States to the United Nations">ambassador of the United States to the United Nations</a> (19971998), <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_Secretary_of_Energy" title="United States Secretary of Energy">Secretary of Energy</a> (19982001) and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Governor_of_New_Mexico" title="Governor of New Mexico">governor of New Mexico</a> (20032011) (b. 1947)<sup id="cite_ref-1457" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1457"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1457<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nels_J._Smith" title="Nels J. Smith">Nels J. Smith</a>, 84, politician, member (19631979) and speaker of (19771979) the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wyoming_House_of_Representatives" title="Wyoming House of Representatives">Wyoming House of Representatives</a> (b. 1939)<sup id="cite_ref-1458" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1458"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1458<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tempt_One" title="Tempt One">Tempt One</a>, 54, graffiti artist (b. 1968/1969)<sup id="cite_ref-1459" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1459"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1459<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>September 2
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walter_Arlen" title="Walter Arlen">Walter Arlen</a>, 103, Austrian-born composer and music critic (b. 1920)<sup id="cite_ref-1460" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1460"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1460<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>

<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marcia_de_Rousse" title="Marcia de Rousse">Marcia de Rousse</a>, 70, actress (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/True_Blood" title="True Blood">True Blood</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/St._Elsewhere" title="St. Elsewhere">St. Elsewhere</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schooled_(TV_series)" title="Schooled (TV series)">Schooled</a></i>) (b. 1953)<sup id="cite_ref-1464" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1464"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1464<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>

<li>September 3

<li>September 7

<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jon_Fausty" title="Jon Fausty">Jon Fausty</a>, 74, sound and recording engineer (b. 1949)<sup id="cite_ref-1587" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1587"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1587<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dianne_Feinstein" title="Dianne Feinstein">Dianne Feinstein</a>, 90, politician, member of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_Senate" title="United States Senate">U.S. Senate</a> (since 1992), <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mayor_of_San_Francisco" title="Mayor of San Francisco">mayor of San Francisco</a> (19781988) and president of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/San_Francisco_Board_of_Supervisors" title="San Francisco Board of Supervisors">San Francisco Board of Supervisors</a> (1978) (b. 1933)<sup id="cite_ref-1588" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1588"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1588<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joyce_Grable" title="Joyce Grable">Joyce Grable</a>, 70, professional wrestler (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Wrestling_Alliance" title="National Wrestling Alliance">NWA</a>) (b. 1952)<sup id="cite_ref-1589" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1589"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1589<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_E._Johnson_(academic)" title="Joseph E. Johnson (academic)">Joseph E. Johnson</a>, 90, academic, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Tennessee_system" title="University of Tennessee system">University of Tennessee system</a> president (19911999) (b. 1933)<sup id="cite_ref-1590" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1590"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1590<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kurt_Schumacher_(American_football)" title="Kurt Schumacher (American football)">Kurt Schumacher</a>, 70, football player (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Orleans_Saints" title="New Orleans Saints">New Orleans Saints</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tampa_Bay_Buccaneers" title="Tampa Bay Buccaneers">Tampa Bay Buccaneers</a>) (b. 1952)<sup id="cite_ref-1591" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1591"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1591<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ed_Young_(illustrator)" title="Ed Young (illustrator)">Ed Young</a>, 91, Chinese-born illustrator (b. 1931)<sup id="cite_ref-1592" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1592"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1592<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>September 30
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russell_Batiste_Jr." title="Russell Batiste Jr.">Russell Batiste Jr.</a>, 57, drummer (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Meters" title="The Meters">The Meters</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vida_Blue_(band)" title="Vida Blue (band)">Vida Blue</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Papa_Grows_Funk" title="Papa Grows Funk">Papa Grows Funk</a>) (b. 1965)<sup id="cite_ref-1593" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1593"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1593<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Flynn_(writer)" title="Michael Flynn (writer)">Michael Flynn</a>, 75, author (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Forest_of_Time" title="The Forest of Time">The Forest of Time</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fallen_Angels_(Niven,_Pournelle,_and_Flynn_novel)" title="Fallen Angels (Niven, Pournelle, and Flynn novel)">Fallen Angels</a></i>) (b. 1947)<sup id="cite_ref-1594" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1594"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1594<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russell_Sherman" title="Russell Sherman">Russell Sherman</a>, 93, classical pianist (b. 1930)<sup id="cite_ref-1595" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1595"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1595<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li></ul>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2"><h2 id="October">October</h2><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=2023_deaths_in_the_United_States&amp;action=edit&amp;section=10" title="Edit section: October"><span>edit</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></div>

<ul><li>October 1
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eve_Bunting" title="Eve Bunting">Eve Bunting</a>, 94, Northern Irish-born author (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smoky_Night" title="Smoky Night">Smoky Night</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Presence:_A_Ghost_Story" title="The Presence: A Ghost Story">The Presence: A Ghost Story</a></i>) (b. 1928)<sup id="cite_ref-1596" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1596"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1596<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Caple" title="Jim Caple">Jim Caple</a>, 61, sports journalist (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ESPN.com" title="ESPN.com">ESPN.com</a>) and writer (b. 1962)<sup id="cite_ref-1597" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1597"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1597<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russ_Francis" title="Russ Francis">Russ Francis</a>, 70, football player (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_England_Patriots" title="New England Patriots">New England Patriots</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/San_Francisco_49ers" title="San Francisco 49ers">San Francisco 49ers</a>) (b. 1953)<sup id="cite_ref-1598" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1598"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1598<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ron_Haffkine" title="Ron Haffkine">Ron Haffkine</a>, 84, record producer and music manager (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dr._Hook_%26_the_Medicine_Show" class="mw-redirect" title="Dr. Hook &amp; the Medicine Show">Dr. Hook &amp; the Medicine Show</a>) (b. 1938)<sup id="cite_ref-1599" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1599"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1599<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>

<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2"><h2 id="November">November</h2><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=2023_deaths_in_the_United_States&amp;action=edit&amp;section=11" title="Edit section: November"><span>edit</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236090951"><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">Main article: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deaths_in_November_2023" title="Deaths in November 2023">Deaths in November 2023</a></div>

<ul><li>November 1
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ady_Barkan" title="Ady Barkan">Ady Barkan</a>, 39, political activist and lawyer (b. 1983)<sup id="cite_ref-1781" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1781"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1781<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norma_Berger" title="Norma Berger">Norma Berger</a>, 90, baseball player (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Springfield_Sallies" title="Springfield Sallies">Springfield Sallies</a>) (b. 1932)<sup id="cite_ref-1782" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1782"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1782<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geaux_Rocket_Ride" title="Geaux Rocket Ride">Geaux Rocket Ride</a>, 3, Thoroughbred racehorse (b. 2020)<sup id="cite_ref-1783" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1783"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1783<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Knight" title="Bob Knight">Bob Knight</a>, 83, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naismith_Memorial_Basketball_Hall_of_Fame" title="Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame">Hall of Fame</a> basketball coach (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indiana_Hoosiers_men%27s_basketball" title="Indiana Hoosiers men's basketball">Indiana Hoosiers</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Texas_Tech_Red_Raiders_basketball" title="Texas Tech Red Raiders basketball">Texas Tech Red Raiders</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1984_United_States_men%27s_Olympic_basketball_team" title="1984 United States men's Olympic basketball team">1984 Olympic Team</a>), Olympic champion (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basketball_at_the_1984_Summer_Olympics" title="Basketball at the 1984 Summer Olympics">1984</a>) (b. 1940)<sup id="cite_ref-1784" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1784"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1784<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Tarnoff" title="Peter Tarnoff">Peter Tarnoff</a>, 86, politician, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Under_Secretary_of_State_for_Political_Affairs" title="Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs">under secretary for political affairs</a> (19931997), president of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Council_on_Foreign_Relations" title="Council on Foreign Relations">Council on Foreign Relations</a> (19861993) (b. 1937)<sup id="cite_ref-1785" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1785"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1785<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_White_(actor)" title="Peter White (actor)">Peter White</a>, 86, actor (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Boys_in_the_Band_(1970_film)" title="The Boys in the Band (1970 film)">The Boys in the Band</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/All_My_Children" title="All My Children">All My Children</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dallas_(1978_TV_series)" title="Dallas (1978 TV series)">Dallas</a></i>) (b. 1937)<sup id="cite_ref-1786" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1786"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1786<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>November 2
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walter_Davis_(basketball)" title="Walter Davis (basketball)">Walter Davis</a>, 69, basketball player (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phoenix_Suns" title="Phoenix Suns">Phoenix Suns</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Denver_Nuggets" title="Denver Nuggets">Denver Nuggets</a>), Olympic champion (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basketball_at_the_1976_Summer_Olympics" title="Basketball at the 1976 Summer Olympics">1976</a>) (b. 1954)<sup id="cite_ref-1787" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1787"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1787<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mortimer_L._Downey" title="Mortimer L. Downey">Mortimer L. Downey</a>, 87, politician, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_Deputy_Secretary_of_Transportation" title="United States Deputy Secretary of Transportation">deputy secretary of transportation</a> (19932001) (b. 1936)<sup id="cite_ref-1788" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1788"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1788<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dick_Drago" title="Dick Drago">Dick Drago</a>, 78, baseball player (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boston_Red_Sox" title="Boston Red Sox">Boston Red Sox</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kansas_City_Royals" title="Kansas City Royals">Kansas City Royals</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Los_Angeles_Angels" title="Los Angeles Angels">California Angels</a>) (b. 1945)<sup id="cite_ref-1789" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1789"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1789<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R._H._Sikes" title="R. H. Sikes">R. H. Sikes</a>, 83, professional golfer (b. 1940)<sup id="cite_ref-1790" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1790"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1790<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brenda_Snipes" title="Brenda Snipes">Brenda Snipes</a>, 80, public official, supervisor of elections for <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Broward_County,_Florida" title="Broward County, Florida">Broward County, Florida</a> (20032018) (b. 1943)<sup id="cite_ref-1791" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1791"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1791<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leroy_Stover" title="Leroy Stover">Leroy Stover</a>, 90, police officer, first black officer in the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Birmingham_Police_Department" title="Birmingham Police Department">Birmingham Police Department</a> (b. 1932/1933)<sup id="cite_ref-1792" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1792"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1792<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Howard_Wayne" title="Howard Wayne">Howard Wayne</a>, 75, politician, member of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/California_State_Assembly" title="California State Assembly">California State Assembly</a> (19962002) (b. 1948)<sup id="cite_ref-1793" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1793"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1793<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>November 3
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Butler_(director)" title="Robert Butler (director)">Robert Butler</a>, 95, film and television director (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Batman_(TV_series)" title="Batman (TV series)">Batman</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Computer_Wore_Tennis_Shoes" title="The Computer Wore Tennis Shoes">The Computer Wore Tennis Shoes</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hill_Street_Blues" title="Hill Street Blues">Hill Street Blues</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Remington_Steele" title="Remington Steele">Remington Steele</a></i>) (b. 1927)<sup id="cite_ref-1794" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1794"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1794<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gary_Colson" title="Gary Colson">Gary Colson</a>, 89, basketball coach (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valdosta_State_Blazers" title="Valdosta State Blazers">Valdosta State Blazers</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pepperdine_Waves_men%27s_basketball" title="Pepperdine Waves men's basketball">Pepperdine Waves</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Mexico_Lobos_men%27s_basketball" title="New Mexico Lobos men's basketball">New Mexico Lobos</a>) (b. 1934)<sup id="cite_ref-1795" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1795"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1795<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bubba_Copeland" title="Bubba Copeland">Bubba Copeland</a>, 49, politician, mayor of <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smiths_Station,_Alabama" title="Smiths Station, Alabama">Smiths Station, Alabama</a> (since 2016) (b. 1974)<sup id="cite_ref-1796" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1796"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1796<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dennis_Higgins" title="Dennis Higgins">Dennis Higgins</a>, 84, baseball player (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chicago_White_Sox" title="Chicago White Sox">Chicago White Sox</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Texas_Rangers_(baseball)" title="Texas Rangers (baseball)">Washington Senators</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/St._Louis_Cardinals" title="St. Louis Cardinals">St. Louis Cardinals</a>) (b. 1939)<sup id="cite_ref-1797" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1797"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1797<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>

<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2"><h2 id="December">December</h2><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=2023_deaths_in_the_United_States&amp;action=edit&amp;section=12" title="Edit section: December"><span>edit</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></div>

<ul><li>December 1
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sandra_Day_O%27Connor" title="Sandra Day O'Connor">Sandra Day O'Connor</a>, 93, jurist, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Associate_Justice_of_the_Supreme_Court_of_the_United_States" title="Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States">associate justice of the supreme court</a> (19812006), member of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arizona_Senate" title="Arizona Senate">Arizona Senate</a> (19691975) and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chancellor_of_the_College_of_William_%26_Mary" title="Chancellor of the College of William &amp; Mary">chancellor of the College of William &amp; Mary</a> (20052012) (b. 1930)<sup id="cite_ref-1949" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1949"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1949<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lyle_Elmer_Strom" title="Lyle Elmer Strom">Lyle Elmer Strom</a>, 98, jurist, judge (since 1985) and chief judge (19871994) of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_District_Court_for_the_District_of_Nebraska" title="United States District Court for the District of Nebraska">U.S. District Court for Nebraska</a> (b. 1925)<sup id="cite_ref-1950" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1950"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1950<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>December 2
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stanley_Graham_(psychologist)" title="Stanley Graham (psychologist)">Stanley Graham</a>, 97, psychologist, president of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_Psychological_Association" title="American Psychological Association">American Psychological Association</a> (1990) (b. 1926)<sup id="cite_ref-1951" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1951"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1951<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clarence_Kelly" title="Clarence Kelly">Clarence Kelly</a>, 82, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sedevacantism" title="Sedevacantism">sedevacantist traditionalist</a> Catholic prelate, superior general of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Society_of_Saint_Pius_V" title="Society of Saint Pius V">Society of Saint Pius V</a> (since 1983) (b. 1941)<sup id="cite_ref-1952" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1952"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1952<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_Hicks_(baseball)" title="Joe Hicks (baseball)">Joe Hicks</a>, 91, baseball player (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chicago_White_Sox" title="Chicago White Sox">Chicago White Sox</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Texas_Rangers_(baseball)" title="Texas Rangers (baseball)">Washington Senators</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_York_Mets" title="New York Mets">New York Mets</a>) (b. 1932)<sup id="cite_ref-1953" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1953"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1953<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maria_Martin_(journalist)" title="Maria Martin (journalist)">Maria Martin</a>, 72, Mexican-born radio journalist (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latino_USA" title="Latino USA">Latino USA</a>) (b. 1951)<sup id="cite_ref-1954" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1954"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1954<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edwin_J._Peterson" title="Edwin J. Peterson">Edwin J. Peterson</a>, 93, jurist, justice (19791993) and chief justice (19831991) of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oregon_Supreme_Court" title="Oregon Supreme Court">Oregon Supreme Court</a> (b. 1930)<sup id="cite_ref-1955" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1955"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1955<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edwin_Wilson_(theater_critic)" title="Edwin Wilson (theater critic)">Edwin Wilson</a>, 96, theater critic (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wall_Street_Journal" title="The Wall Street Journal">The Wall Street Journal</a></i>) (b. 1927)<sup id="cite_ref-1956" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1956"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1956<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>December 3
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Claude_Engle" title="Claude Engle">Claude Engle</a>, 85, electrical engineer (b. 1938)<sup id="cite_ref-1957" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1957"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1957<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andrea_Fay_Friedman" title="Andrea Fay Friedman">Andrea Fay Friedman</a>, 53, actress (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Life_Goes_On_(TV_series)" title="Life Goes On (TV series)">Life Goes On</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Family_Guy" title="Family Guy">Family Guy</a></i>) (b. 1970)<sup id="cite_ref-1958" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1958"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1958<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._D.%27s_Revenge" title="J. D.'s Revenge">David McKnight</a>, 87, actor (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._D.%27s_Revenge" title="J. D.'s Revenge">J. D.'s Revenge</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hollywood_Shuffle" title="Hollywood Shuffle">Hollywood Shuffle</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Five_Heartbeats" title="The Five Heartbeats">The Five Heartbeats</a></i>) (b. 1936)<sup id="cite_ref-1959" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1959"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1959<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jerome_O%27Neill" title="Jerome O'Neill">Jerome O'Neill</a>, 77, attorney, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_District_Court_for_the_District_of_Vermont" title="United States District Court for the District of Vermont">U.S. attorney for the District of Vermont</a> (1981) (b. 1946)<sup id="cite_ref-1960" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1960"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1960<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>December 4
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Juanita_Castro" title="Juanita Castro">Juanita Castro</a>, 90, Cuban-born activist (b. 1933)<sup id="cite_ref-1961" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1961"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1961<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_L._Easton" title="James L. Easton">James L. Easton</a>, 88, businessman, philanthropist, and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archery_Hall_of_Fame" title="Archery Hall of Fame">Hall of Fame</a> archer, president of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Archery_Federation#Presidents" class="mw-redirect" title="World Archery Federation">World Archery Federation</a> (19892005) (b. 1935)<sup id="cite_ref-1962" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1962"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1962<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edgar_S._Woolard_Jr." title="Edgar S. Woolard Jr.">Edgar S. Woolard Jr.</a>, 89, businessman (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DuPont" title="DuPont">DuPont</a>) (b. 1934)<sup id="cite_ref-1963" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1963"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1963<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>December 5
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ralph_Cirella" class="mw-redirect" title="Ralph Cirella">Ralph Cirella</a>, 58, stylist and makeup artist (b. 1964/1965)<sup id="cite_ref-1964" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1964"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1964<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Dahmer" title="Lionel Dahmer">Lionel Dahmer</a>, 87, chemist (b. 1936)<sup id="cite_ref-1965" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1965"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1965<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ron_Fernandes" title="Ron Fernandes">Ron Fernandes</a>, 72, football player (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baltimore_Colts" title="Baltimore Colts">Baltimore Colts</a>) (b. 1951)<sup id="cite_ref-1966" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1966"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1966<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vojislav_Govedarica" title="Vojislav Govedarica">Vojislav Govedarica</a>, 8283, Serbian-born actor (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rambo:_First_Blood_Part_II" title="Rambo: First Blood Part II">Rambo: First Blood Part II</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Little_Nikita" title="Little Nikita">Little Nikita</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionheart_(1990_film)" title="Lionheart (1990 film)">Lionheart</a></i>) (b. 1940)<sup id="cite_ref-1967" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1967"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1967<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norman_Lear" title="Norman Lear">Norman Lear</a>, 101, screenwriter and producer (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/All_in_the_Family" title="All in the Family">All in the Family</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maude_(TV_series)" title="Maude (TV series)">Maude</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Jeffersons" title="The Jeffersons">The Jeffersons</a></i>) (b. 1922)<sup id="cite_ref-1968" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1968"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1968<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lawrence_Steven_Meyers" title="Lawrence Steven Meyers">Lawrence Steven Meyers</a>, 67, actor (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dick_Tracy_(1990_film)" title="Dick Tracy (1990 film)">Dick Tracy</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_Beyond_the_Stars" title="Battle Beyond the Stars">Battle Beyond the Stars</a></i>) and film producer (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unfaithful_(2002_film)" title="Unfaithful (2002 film)">Unfaithful</a></i>) (b. 1956)<sup id="cite_ref-1969" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1969"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1969<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>December 6
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Hogan" title="Jack Hogan">Jack Hogan</a>, 94, actor (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Legend_of_Tom_Dooley" title="The Legend of Tom Dooley">The Legend of Tom Dooley</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Cat_Burglar" title="The Cat Burglar">The Cat Burglar</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Combat!" title="Combat!">Combat!</a></i>) (b. 1929)<sup id="cite_ref-1970" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1970"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1970<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>

<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bobby_Rivers" title="Bobby Rivers">Bobby Rivers</a>, 70, television personality (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WISN-TV" title="WISN-TV">WISN-TV</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WPIX" title="WPIX">WPIX</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VH1" title="VH1">VH1</a>) (b. 1953)<sup id="cite_ref-2068" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2068"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2068<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Smothers" title="Tom Smothers">Tom Smothers</a>, 86, comedian and musician (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smothers_Brothers" title="Smothers Brothers">Smothers Brothers</a>) (b. 1937)<sup id="cite_ref-2069" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2069"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2069<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>December 27
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ken_Bowman" title="Ken Bowman">Ken Bowman</a>, 81, football player (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Green_Bay_Packers" title="Green Bay Packers">Green Bay Packers</a>) (b. 1942)<sup id="cite_ref-2070" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2070"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2070<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Forestry_(horse)" title="Forestry (horse)">Forestry</a>, 27, Thoroughbred racehorse (b. 1996)<sup id="cite_ref-2071" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2071"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2071<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Gibbons_Jr." class="mw-redirect" title="Michael Gibbons Jr.">Michael Gibbons Jr.</a>, guitarist (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leeway_(band)" title="Leeway (band)">Leeway</a>)<sup id="cite_ref-2072" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2072"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2072<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herb_Kohl" title="Herb Kohl">Herb Kohl</a>, 88, politician and businessman (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kohl%27s" title="Kohl's">Kohl's</a>), member of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/U.S._Senate" class="mw-redirect" title="U.S. Senate">U.S. Senate</a> (19892013) (b. 1935)<sup id="cite_ref-2073" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2073"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2073<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ignacio_E._Lozano_Jr." title="Ignacio E. Lozano Jr.">Ignacio E. Lozano Jr.</a>, 96, diplomat, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ambassadors_of_the_United_States_to_El_Salvador" title="List of ambassadors of the United States to El Salvador">ambassador to El Salvador</a> (19761977) (b. 1927)<sup id="cite_ref-2074" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2074"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2074<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>December 28
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kelly_Doran" title="Kelly Doran">Kelly Doran</a>, 66, businessman and real estate developer (b. 1957)<sup id="cite_ref-2075" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2075"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2075<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_McColl" title="Bill McColl">Bill McColl</a>, 93, football player (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chicago_Bears" title="Chicago Bears">Chicago Bears</a>) (b. 1930)<sup id="cite_ref-2076" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2076"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2076<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herman_Raucher" title="Herman Raucher">Herman Raucher</a>, 95, screenwriter (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Summer_of_%2742" title="Summer of '42">Summer of '42</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Class_of_%2744" title="Class of '44">Class of '44</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Other_Side_of_Midnight_(film)" title="The Other Side of Midnight (film)">The Other Side of Midnight</a></i>) (b. 1928)<sup id="cite_ref-2077" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2077"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2077<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tommy_Talton" title="Tommy Talton">Tommy Talton</a>, 74, guitarist (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/We_the_People_(band)" title="We the People (band)">We the People</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cowboy_(band)" title="Cowboy (band)">Cowboy</a>) (b. 1949)<sup id="cite_ref-2078" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2078"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2078<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Wildmon" title="Donald Wildmon">Donald Wildmon</a>, 85, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Methodist_Church" title="United Methodist Church">United Methodist</a> minister, author, and radio host, founder of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_Family_Association" title="American Family Association">American Family Association</a> (b. 1939)<sup id="cite_ref-2079" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2079"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2079<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>December 29
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maurice_Hines" title="Maurice Hines">Maurice Hines</a>, 80, actor (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Cotton_Club_(film)" title="The Cotton Club (film)">The Cotton Club</a></i>), singer and choreographer (b. 1943)<sup id="cite_ref-2080" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2080"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2080<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roland_Leong" title="Roland Leong">Roland Leong</a>, 78, drag racer (b. 1945)<sup id="cite_ref-2081" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2081"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2081<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Les_McCann" title="Les McCann">Les McCann</a>, 88, jazz pianist and singer ("<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Compared_to_What" title="Compared to What">Compared to What</a>") (b. 1935)<sup id="cite_ref-2082" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2082"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2082<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joey_Meyer_(basketball)" title="Joey Meyer (basketball)">Joey Meyer</a>, 74, basketball player and coach (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DePaul_Blue_Demons_men%27s_basketball" title="DePaul Blue Demons men's basketball">DePaul Blue Demons</a>) (b. 1949)<sup id="cite_ref-2083" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2083"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2083<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sandra_Reaves-Phillips" title="Sandra Reaves-Phillips">Sandra Reaves-Phillips</a>, 79, actress (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ma_Rainey%27s_Black_Bottom" title="Ma Rainey's Black Bottom">Ma Rainey's Black Bottom</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Round_Midnight_(film)" title="Round Midnight (film)">Round Midnight</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lean_on_Me_(film)" title="Lean on Me (film)">Lean on Me</a></i>), writer, and singer (b. 1944)<sup id="cite_ref-2084" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2084"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2084<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>December 30
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martha_Diamond" title="Martha Diamond">Martha Diamond</a>, 79, painter (b. 1944)<sup id="cite_ref-2085" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2085"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2085<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>

Peters</a>, 60, politician, member of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maryland_Senate" title="Maryland Senate">Maryland Senate</a> (20072021) (b. 1963)<sup id="cite_ref-2087" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2087"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2087<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul></li>
<li>December 31
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shecky_Greene" title="Shecky Greene">Shecky Greene</a>, 97, comedian and actor (<i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/History_of_the_World,_Part_I" title="History of the World, Part I">History of the World, Part I</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Splash_(film)" title="Splash (film)">Splash</a></i>, <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tony_Rome" title="Tony Rome">Tony Rome</a></i>) (b. 1926)<sup id="cite_ref-2088" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2088"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2088<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eddie_Bernice_Johnson" title="Eddie Bernice Johnson">Eddie Bernice Johnson</a>, 88, politician, member of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/U.S._House_of_Representatives" class="mw-redirect" title="U.S. House of Representatives">U.S. House of Representatives</a> (19932023) and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Texas_Senate" title="Texas Senate">Texas Senate</a> (19871993) (b. 1935)<sup id="cite_ref-2089" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2089"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2089<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
